data.persona: I own this land that the indolent soldiers are camping on. They have been here all summer. If I had known, I would not have sown any crops this spring. Now we are approaching harvest time and my fields are trampled. I am not sure how my family will survive this fall. I have worked my whole life for this land, and now it is ruining me.
data.description:
You are in the Chicken Pen.
The chicken pen has wire cages situated on three different levels, with hay at the bottom for the chicken's to sit in. There lie small holes in the cages for the eggs to fall through and be easily harvested by the farmers. The old wooden walls of the chicken pen are beginning to deteriorate and show signs of age.
The chicken and the farmers are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will follow the farmers to the barn to get fresh wood and tools.
data.mid_motivation: I will build a bigger and better chicken pen with my fellow farmers.
data.long_motivation: I will be able to feed my family with the extra chickens I will be able to acquire to fit in my new pen.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go other farmer's property to ask for help.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug other farmers when they offer to help.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the pen to show farmers how bad it is.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get fresh wood from the shed.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: use tools with wood to build a bigger and better pen.
